comment:
Dry hopped for 5 days with 1 ounce Citra. Woowee, that citrus smell at bottling was strong!
Bottled after cold crashing on 2/11/2014. will update on taste once it has bottle conditioned.
Just opened the bottle and tried it. Wow what a great beer. all the hop flavor of an APA but smooth like a Blonde. One of my best brews to date, will brew again.
